text: Thang cam ky uoc bu lai bang thang cam ky, va nhung hanh ong xam hai van phai thi hanh theo luat Qisas. Boi the, ai xam hai cac nguoi thi cac nguoi hay ap tra lai y giong nhu viec y a xam hai cac nguoi. Nhung cac nguoi hay kinh so Allah, qua that Ngai luon o cung voi nhung nguoi biet kinh so Ngai
